tha-ap425:11.1: Na me deyyadhammo atthi → na me deyyaṃ tava atthi (bj, s2, s3) | na me deyyaṃ tavam atthi (pts1)
tha-ap425:13.1: Vissattho → vissaṭṭho (s2, s3, pts1, mr) | visaṭṭho (c1)
tha-ap425:13.4: paripūrissatināgate → paripūrissatanāgate (bj) | paripūressatāsanaṃ (s2, s3) | paripūressati'nāgate (pts1) | paripūrissatāsanaṃ (mr)
